content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":253972,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスの期待になんとか応えようとするが・・難しい","translatedEnglishLine":"Trying somehow to meet Rance's expectations... but it's difficult."},{"lineNumber":253973,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tでも、ランスもへっちゃら、そこがビスケッタさんらしくて良い。","translatedEnglishLine":"But Rance is unfazed; that's just like Biscetta, and it's good."},{"lineNumber":253974,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tどこかにロナ・ケスチナの話もまぜる、ランス城に保護しました。","translatedEnglishLine":"Also, somewhere mix in the story of Rona Kestina; she was taken into protection at Rance Castle."},{"lineNumber":253975,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t後でお会いになりますか","translatedEnglishLine":"Shall we meet later?"},{"lineNumber":253976,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tもちろんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Of course."},{"lineNumber":253977,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tお風呂に入れ、清潔にして、痩せすぎですが、健康になれば可愛い娘さんです","translatedEnglishLine":"She was given a bath and cleaned up; although too thin, if she becomes healthy, she's a cute girl."},{"lineNumber":253978,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tですが旦那様の対象には年齢的に難しいかと・・","translatedEnglishLine":"However, regarding becoming the master’s partner, I think the age is a problem..."},{"lineNumber":253979,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tなら、収穫はもう少し先だな、それまで任せる","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, the harvest will have to wait a little longer. I'll leave it to you until then."},{"lineNumber":253980,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t総統司令部","translatedEnglishLine":"Supreme Commander Headquarters"},{"lineNumber":253981,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t世界各地の戦況が入って来ているが","translatedEnglishLine":"War situation reports are coming in from around the world,"},{"lineNumber":253982,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔軍優勢ばかりで状況最悪に近い","translatedEnglishLine":"But it's all in favor of the demon army, the situation is near worst-case."},{"lineNumber":253983,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＪＡＰＡＮに攻め込もうとしている魔軍","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army trying to invade JAPAN."},{"lineNumber":253984,"originalJapaneseLine":"天満橋に大軍を展開している","translatedEnglishLine":"They have deployed a large force at Tenmabashi."},{"lineNumber":253985,"originalJapaneseLine":"織田城のランスは迎撃準備","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance at Oda Castle is preparing for interception."},{"lineNumber":253986,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、黒部の復活で戦力は半減している","translatedEnglishLine":"However, due to Kurobe's revival, their strength has been halved."},{"lineNumber":253987,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、勇者テオマン","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, the hero Teoman,"},{"lineNumber":253988,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t人類の死者が５０％を越え準備が整った","translatedEnglishLine":"With human casualties exceeding 50%, preparations are complete."},{"lineNumber":253989,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t美樹を殺しに現れるが地獄に落とされる","translatedEnglishLine":"He appears to kill Miki but is cast into hell."},{"lineNumber":253990,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t美樹の魔王化が近づいていた","translatedEnglishLine":"Miki’s transformation into a Demon Lord was approaching."},{"lineNumber":253991,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその事を知ったケイブリスが焦り","translatedEnglishLine":"Learning this, Kaebris grows anxious."},{"lineNumber":253992,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t大量の魔軍が天満橋に攻めてきた","translatedEnglishLine":"A large demon army attacked Tenmabashi."},{"lineNumber":253993,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＪＡＰＡＮ、総統司令部","translatedEnglishLine":"JAPAN, Supreme Commander Headquarters."},{"lineNumber":253994,"originalJapaneseLine":"天満橋が魔軍に突破された、モロッコ、カイロ、アマゾン、戦艦長門、出雲","translatedEnglishLine":"Tenmabashi was breached by the demon army; Morocco, Cairo, Amazon, battleships Nagato and Izumo,"},{"lineNumber":253995,"originalJapaneseLine":"と占領され、さらに進撃を続けてきている","translatedEnglishLine":"have been occupied, and they continue their advance."},{"lineNumber":253996,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人ケイブリスも参加している模様","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems the demon Kaebris is also participating."},{"lineNumber":253997,"originalJapaneseLine":"とても防ぎきれない・・","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s impossible to fully defend..."},{"lineNumber":253998,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":253999,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし直面でもっとやばいのは","translatedEnglishLine":"But the even more dangerous problem facing us is"},{"lineNumber":254000,"originalJapaneseLine":"座敷牢に美樹は入れている物のやばい状態","translatedEnglishLine":"Although Miki is confined in a tatami cell, her condition is critical."},{"lineNumber":254001,"originalJapaneseLine":"もう数日で魔王化は避けられない","translatedEnglishLine":"In just a few days, her turning into a Demon Lord is unavoidable."},{"lineNumber":254002,"originalJapaneseLine":"　（イメージ　原発がメルトダウンやばい、その時、中国軍も攻めてきたというようなノリ）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Image: a nuclear plant meltdown crisis, and at the same time, Chinese troops also attacking — that kind of vibe)"},{"lineNumber":254003,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラ、クルックー、カフェ、参謀達、あらゆる方法が試されたが・・うまくいかない","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella, Krukkuu, Cafe, and the staff tried every possible method... but none worked."},{"lineNumber":254004,"originalJapaneseLine":"美樹を今殺すしか手段は無い、だが・・ランスは決断出来ない","translatedEnglishLine":"The only way is to kill Miki now, but... Rance cannot make that decision."},{"lineNumber":254005,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰かがランスにかわってやろうとするが止められる、または、小さな傷しかつかない","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone tries to do it instead of Rance but is stopped or only inflicts minor wounds."},{"lineNumber":254006,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオス、駄目だ・・もうこの状況の魔王に儂が攻撃しても数ヶ月殴り続けないと殺せないだろう","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos says, 'No good... Even if I attack this Demon Lord in her current state, I'd have to keep hitting her for months to kill her.'"},{ "lineNumber":254007, "originalJapaneseLine":"間に合わない","translatedEnglishLine":"We won’t make it in time."},{"lineNumber":254008,"originalJapaneseLine":"このシーンは、次の点","translatedEnglishLine":"This scene addresses the following points:"},{"lineNumber":254009,"originalJapaneseLine":"　・誰かが魔王になる","translatedEnglishLine":"  - Someone becomes a Demon Lord."},{"lineNumber":254010,"originalJapaneseLine":"　・コールドスリープ","translatedEnglishLine":"  - Cold sleep."},{"lineNumber":254011,"originalJapaneseLine":"この２点の解決案以外で何かあれば・・タメさせて下さい、で、失敗する","translatedEnglishLine":"If there's any solution other than these two, let us try to delay, but it will fail."},{"lineNumber":254012,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうしようもないという状況","translatedEnglishLine":"A situation where nothing can be done."},{"lineNumber":254013,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＪＡＰＡＮ、総統司令部","translatedEnglishLine":"JAPAN, Supreme Commander Headquarters."},{"lineNumber":254014,"originalJapaneseLine":"天満橋が魔軍に突破された、モロッコ、カイロ、アマゾン、戦艦長門、出雲","translatedEnglishLine":"Tenmabashi was breached by the demon army; Morocco, Cairo, Amazon, battleships Nagato and Izumo,"},{"lineNumber":254015,"originalJapaneseLine":"と占領され、さらに進撃を続けてきている","translatedEnglishLine":"have been occupied, and the advance continues."},{"lineNumber":254016,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人ケイブリスも参加している模様","translatedEnglishLine":"It appears demon Kaebris is also joining."},{"lineNumber":254017,"originalJapaneseLine":"とても防ぎきれない・・","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s impossible to fully defend..."},{"lineNumber":254018,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":254019,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし直面でもっとやばいのは","translatedEnglishLine":"But the even more urgent problem facing us is"},{"lineNumber":254020,"originalJapaneseLine":"座敷牢に美樹は入れている物のやばい状態","translatedEnglishLine":"Although Miki is confined in the tatami cell, her condition is critical."},{"lineNumber":254021,"originalJapaneseLine":"もう数日で魔王化は避けられない","translatedEnglishLine":"In just a few days, the transformation into a Demon Lord is unavoidable."},{"lineNumber":254022,"originalJapaneseLine":"　（イメージ　原発がメルトダウンやばい、その時、中国軍も攻めてきたというようなノリ）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Image: a nuclear meltdown crisis, and simultaneously, Chinese troops invade — that kind of vibe)"},{"lineNumber":254023,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":254024,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうする、みんながランスに期待する・・","translatedEnglishLine":"What to do? Everyone is counting on Rance..."},{"lineNumber":254025,"originalJapaneseLine":"くっ・・美樹ちゃんの事は頼んだ、なんとかもたせろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Damn... I'm counting on you to take care of Miki-chan, keep her alive somehow."},{"lineNumber":254026,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺はケイブリスをやりにいく。","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ll go take care of Kaebris."},{"lineNumber":254027,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＪＡＰＡＮに進軍して来ている魔軍と何度か戦った後","translatedEnglishLine":"After fighting the demon army advancing into JAPAN several times,"},{"lineNumber":254028,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブリスに接触する","translatedEnglishLine":"He contacts Kaebris."},{"lineNumber":254029,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シャングリラの偽者にあったかどうかも確定出来ないので","translatedEnglishLine":"Since it cannot be confirmed whether he met the fake Shangri-La,"},{"lineNumber":254030,"originalJapaneseLine":"　始めてぽい感じで","translatedEnglishLine":"It feels like the first time,"},{"lineNumber":254031,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブリスと接触する、ケイブリスはカオスを持つランスの事は知っていたし","translatedEnglishLine":"He contacts Kaebris, who was aware that Rance possesses Chaos."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの期待になんとか応えようとするが・・難しい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Trying somehow to meet Rance's expectations... but it's difficult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、ランスもへっちゃら、そこがビスケッタさんらしくて良い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Rance is unfazed; that's just like Biscetta, and it's good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこかにロナ・ケスチナの話もまぜる、ランス城に保護しました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, somewhere mix in the story of Rona Kestina; she was taken into protection at Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後でお会いになりますか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shall we meet later?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もちろんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お風呂に入れ、清潔にして、痩せすぎですが、健康になれば可愛い娘さんです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She was given a bath and cleaned up; although too thin, if she becomes healthy, she's a cute girl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ですが旦那様の対象には年齢的に難しいかと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, regarding becoming the master’s partner, I think the age is a problem...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら、収穫はもう少し先だな、それまで任せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, the harvest will have to wait a little longer. I'll leave it to you until then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Supreme Commander Headquarters

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界各地の戦況が入って来ているが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: War situation reports are coming in from around the world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍優勢ばかりで状況最悪に近い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But it's all in favor of the demon army, the situation is near worst-case.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮに攻め込もうとしている魔軍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army trying to invade JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天満橋に大軍を展開している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They have deployed a large force at Tenmabashi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 織田城のランスは迎撃準備
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance at Oda Castle is preparing for interception.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、黒部の復活で戦力は半減している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, due to Kurobe's revival, their strength has been halved.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、勇者テオマン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the hero Teoman,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類の死者が５０％を越え準備が整った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With human casualties exceeding 50%, preparations are complete.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹を殺しに現れるが地獄に落とされる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He appears to kill Miki but is cast into hell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹の魔王化が近づいていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki’s transformation into a Demon Lord was approaching.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その事を知ったケイブリスが焦り
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Learning this, Kaebris grows anxious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大量の魔軍が天満橋に攻めてきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A large demon army attacked Tenmabashi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮ、総統司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: JAPAN, Supreme Commander Headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天満橋が魔軍に突破された、モロッコ、カイロ、アマゾン、戦艦長門、出雲
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tenmabashi was breached by the demon army; Morocco, Cairo, Amazon, battleships Nagato and Izumo,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と占領され、さらに進撃を続けてきている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have been occupied, and they continue their advance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケイブリスも参加している模様
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems the demon Kaebris is also participating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とても防ぎきれない・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s impossible to fully defend...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし直面でもっとやばいのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But the even more dangerous problem facing us is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 座敷牢に美樹は入れている物のやばい状態
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Although Miki is confined in a tatami cell, her condition is critical.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう数日で魔王化は避けられない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In just a few days, her turning into a Demon Lord is unavoidable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （イメージ　原発がメルトダウンやばい、その時、中国軍も攻めてきたというようなノリ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Image: a nuclear plant meltdown crisis, and at the same time, Chinese troops also attacking — that kind of vibe)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ、クルックー、カフェ、参謀達、あらゆる方法が試されたが・・うまくいかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella, Krukkuu, Cafe, and the staff tried every possible method... but none worked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹を今殺すしか手段は無い、だが・・ランスは決断出来ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The only way is to kill Miki now, but... Rance cannot make that decision.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かがランスにかわってやろうとするが止められる、または、小さな傷しかつかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone tries to do it instead of Rance but is stopped or only inflicts minor wounds.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス、駄目だ・・もうこの状況の魔王に儂が攻撃しても数ヶ月殴り続けないと殺せないだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos says, 'No good... Even if I attack this Demon Lord in her current state, I'd have to keep hitting her for months to kill her.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 間に合わない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We won’t make it in time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このシーンは、次の点
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This scene addresses the following points:

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・誰かが魔王になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - Someone becomes a Demon Lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・コールドスリープ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - Cold sleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この２点の解決案以外で何かあれば・・タメさせて下さい、で、失敗する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If there's any solution other than these two, let us try to delay, but it will fail.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしようもないという状況
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A situation where nothing can be done.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮ、総統司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: JAPAN, Supreme Commander Headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天満橋が魔軍に突破された、モロッコ、カイロ、アマゾン、戦艦長門、出雲
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tenmabashi was breached by the demon army; Morocco, Cairo, Amazon, battleships Nagato and Izumo,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と占領され、さらに進撃を続けてきている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have been occupied, and the advance continues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケイブリスも参加している模様
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It appears demon Kaebris is also joining.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とても防ぎきれない・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s impossible to fully defend...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし直面でもっとやばいのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But the even more urgent problem facing us is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 座敷牢に美樹は入れている物のやばい状態
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Although Miki is confined in the tatami cell, her condition is critical.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう数日で魔王化は避けられない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In just a few days, the transformation into a Demon Lord is unavoidable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （イメージ　原発がメルトダウンやばい、その時、中国軍も攻めてきたというようなノリ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Image: a nuclear meltdown crisis, and simultaneously, Chinese troops invade — that kind of vibe)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうする、みんながランスに期待する・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What to do? Everyone is counting on Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くっ・・美樹ちゃんの事は頼んだ、なんとかもたせろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn... I'm counting on you to take care of Miki-chan, keep her alive somehow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺はケイブリスをやりにいく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll go take care of Kaebris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮに進軍して来ている魔軍と何度か戦った後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After fighting the demon army advancing into JAPAN several times,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスに接触する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He contacts Kaebris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャングリラの偽者にあったかどうかも確定出来ないので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since it cannot be confirmed whether he met the fake Shangri-La,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 始めてぽい感じで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It feels like the first time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスと接触する、ケイブリスはカオスを持つランスの事は知っていたし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He contacts Kaebris, who was aware that Rance possesses Chaos.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

troops also attacking — that kind of vibe)"},{"lineNumber":254003,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラ、クルックー、カフェ、参謀達、あらゆる方法が試されたが・・うまくいかない","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella, Krukkuu, Cafe, and the staff tried every possible method... but none worked."},{"lineNumber":254004,"originalJapaneseLine":"美樹を今殺すしか手段は無い、だが・・ランスは決断出来ない","translatedEnglishLine":"The only way is to kill Miki now, but... Even if I attack this Demon Lord in her current state, I'd have to keep hitting her for months to kill her.'"},{ "lineNumber":254007, "originalJapaneseLine":"間に合わない","translatedEnglishLine":"We won’t make it in time."},{"lineNumber":254008,"originalJapaneseLine":"このシーンは、次の点","translatedEnglishLine":"This scene addresses the following points:"},{"lineNumber":254009,"originalJapaneseLine":"　・誰かが魔王になる","translatedEnglishLine":"  - Someone becomes a Demon Lord."},{"lineNumber":254010,"originalJapaneseLine":"　・コールドスリープ","translatedEnglishLine":"  - Cold sleep."},{"lineNumber":254011,"originalJapaneseLine":"この２点の解決案以外で何かあれば・・タメさせて下さい、で、失敗する","translatedEnglishLine":"If there's any solution other than these two, let us try to delay, but it will fail."},{"lineNumber":254012,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうしようもないという状況","translatedEnglishLine":"A situation where nothing can be done."},{"lineNumber":254013,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＪＡＰＡＮ、総統司令部","translatedEnglishLine":"JAPAN, Supreme Commander Headquarters."},{"lineNumber":254014,"originalJapaneseLine":"天満橋が魔軍に突破された、モロッコ、カイロ、アマゾン、戦艦長門、出雲","translatedEnglishLine":"Tenmabashi was breached by the demon army; Morocco, Cairo, Amazon, battleships Nagato and Izumo,"},{"lineNumber":254015,"originalJapaneseLine":"と占領され、さらに進撃を続けてきている","translatedEnglishLine":"have been occupied, and the advance continues."},{"lineNumber":254016,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人ケイブリスも参加している模様","translatedEnglishLine":"It appears demon Kaebris is also joining."},{"lineNumber":254017,"originalJapaneseLine":"とても防ぎきれない・・","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s impossible to fully defend..."},{"lineNumber":254018,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":254019,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし直面でもっとやばいのは","translatedEnglishLine":"But the even more urgent problem facing us is"},{"lineNumber":254020,"originalJapaneseLine":"座敷牢に美樹は入れている物のやばい状態","translatedEnglishLine":"Although Miki is confined in the tatami cell, her condition is critical."},{"lineNumber":254021,"originalJapaneseLine":"もう数日で魔王化は避けられない","translatedEnglishLine":"In just a few days, the transformation into a Demon Lord is unavoidable."},{"lineNumber":254022,"originalJapaneseLine":"　（イメージ　原発がメルトダウンやばい、その時、中国軍も攻めてきたというようなノリ）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Image: a nuclear meltdown crisis, and simultaneously, Chinese troops invade — that kind of vibe)"},{"lineNumber":254023,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":254024,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうする、みんながランスに期待する・・","translatedEnglishLine":"What to do? I'm counting on you to take care of Miki-chan, keep her alive somehow."},{"lineNumber":254026,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺はケイブリスをやりにいく。","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ll go take care of Kaebris."},{"lineNumber":254027,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＪＡＰＡＮに進軍して来ている魔軍と何度か戦った後","translatedEnglishLine":"After fighting the demon army advancing into JAPAN several times,"},{"lineNumber":254028,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブリスに接触する","translatedEnglishLine":"He contacts Kaebris."},{"lineNumber":254029,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シャングリラの偽者にあったかどうかも確定出来ないので","translatedEnglishLine":"Since it cannot be confirmed whether he met the fake Shangri-La,"},{"lineNumber":254030,"originalJapaneseLine":"　始めてぽい感じで","translatedEnglishLine":"It feels like the first time,"},{"lineNumber":254031,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブリスと接触する、ケイブリスはカオスを持つランスの事は知っていたし","translatedEnglishLine":"He contacts Kaebris, who was aware that Rance possesses Chaos."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの期待になんとか応えようとするが・・難しい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Trying somehow to meet Rance's expectations... but it's difficult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、ランスもへっちゃら、そこがビスケッタさんらしくて良い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Rance is unfazed; that's just like Biscetta, and it's good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこかにロナ・ケスチナの話もまぜる、ランス城に保護しました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, somewhere mix in the story of Rona Kestina; she was taken into protection at Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後でお会いになりますか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shall we meet later?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もちろんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お風呂に入れ、清潔にして、痩せすぎですが、健康になれば可愛い娘さんです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She was given a bath and cleaned up; although too thin, if she becomes healthy, she's a cute girl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ですが旦那様の対象には年齢的に難しいかと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, regarding becoming the master’s partner, I think the age is a problem...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら、収穫はもう少し先だな、それまで任せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, the harvest will have to wait a little longer. I'll leave it to you until then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Supreme Commander Headquarters

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界各地の戦況が入って来ているが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: War situation reports are coming in from around the world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍優勢ばかりで状況最悪に近い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But it's all in favor of the demon army, the situation is near worst-case.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮに攻め込もうとしている魔軍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army trying to invade JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天満橋に大軍を展開している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They have deployed a large force at Tenmabashi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 織田城のランスは迎撃準備
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance at Oda Castle is preparing for interception.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、黒部の復活で戦力は半減している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, due to Kurobe's revival, their strength has been halved.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、勇者テオマン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the hero Teoman,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類の死者が５０％を越え準備が整った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With human casualties exceeding 50%, preparations are complete.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹を殺しに現れるが地獄に落とされる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He appears to kill Miki but is cast into hell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹の魔王化が近づいていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki’s transformation into a Demon Lord was approaching.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その事を知ったケイブリスが焦り
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Learning this, Kaebris grows anxious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大量の魔軍が天満橋に攻めてきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A large demon army attacked Tenmabashi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮ、総統司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: JAPAN, Supreme Commander Headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天満橋が魔軍に突破された、モロッコ、カイロ、アマゾン、戦艦長門、出雲
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tenmabashi was breached by the demon army; Morocco, Cairo, Amazon, battleships Nagato and Izumo,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と占領され、さらに進撃を続けてきている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have been occupied, and they continue their advance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケイブリスも参加している模様
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems the demon Kaebris is also participating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とても防ぎきれない・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s impossible to fully defend...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし直面でもっとやばいのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But the even more dangerous problem facing us is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 座敷牢に美樹は入れている物のやばい状態
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Although Miki is confined in a tatami cell, her condition is critical.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう数日で魔王化は避けられない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In just a few days, her turning into a Demon Lord is unavoidable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （イメージ　原発がメルトダウンやばい、その時、中国軍も攻めてきたというようなノリ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Image: a nuclear plant meltdown crisis, and at the same time, Chinese troops also attacking — that kind of vibe)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ、クルックー、カフェ、参謀達、あらゆる方法が試されたが・・うまくいかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella, Krukkuu, Cafe, and the staff tried every possible method... but none worked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹を今殺すしか手段は無い、だが・・ランスは決断出来ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The only way is to kill Miki now, but... Rance cannot make that decision.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かがランスにかわってやろうとするが止められる、または、小さな傷しかつかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone tries to do it instead of Rance but is stopped or only inflicts minor wounds.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス、駄目だ・・もうこの状況の魔王に儂が攻撃しても数ヶ月殴り続けないと殺せないだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos says, 'No good... Even if I attack this Demon Lord in her current state, I'd have to keep hitting her for months to kill her.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 間に合わない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We won’t make it in time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このシーンは、次の点
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This scene addresses the following points:

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・誰かが魔王になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - Someone becomes a Demon Lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・コールドスリープ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - Cold sleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この２点の解決案以外で何かあれば・・タメさせて下さい、で、失敗する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If there's any solution other than these two, let us try to delay, but it will fail.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしようもないという状況
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A situation where nothing can be done.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮ、総統司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: JAPAN, Supreme Commander Headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天満橋が魔軍に突破された、モロッコ、カイロ、アマゾン、戦艦長門、出雲
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tenmabashi was breached by the demon army; Morocco, Cairo, Amazon, battleships Nagato and Izumo,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と占領され、さらに進撃を続けてきている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have been occupied, and the advance continues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケイブリスも参加している模様
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It appears demon Kaebris is also joining.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とても防ぎきれない・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s impossible to fully defend...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし直面でもっとやばいのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But the even more urgent problem facing us is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 座敷牢に美樹は入れている物のやばい状態
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Although Miki is confined in the tatami cell, her condition is critical.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう数日で魔王化は避けられない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In just a few days, the transformation into a Demon Lord is unavoidable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （イメージ　原発がメルトダウンやばい、その時、中国軍も攻めてきたというようなノリ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Image: a nuclear meltdown crisis, and simultaneously, Chinese troops invade — that kind of vibe)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうする、みんながランスに期待する・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What to do? Everyone is counting on Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くっ・・美樹ちゃんの事は頼んだ、なんとかもたせろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn... I'm counting on you to take care of Miki-chan, keep her alive somehow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺はケイブリスをやりにいく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll go take care of Kaebris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮに進軍して来ている魔軍と何度か戦った後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After fighting the demon army advancing into JAPAN several times,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスに接触する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He contacts Kaebris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャングリラの偽者にあったかどうかも確定出来ないので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since it cannot be confirmed whether he met the fake Shangri-La,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 始めてぽい感じで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It feels like the first time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスと接触する、ケイブリスはカオスを持つランスの事は知っていたし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He contacts Kaebris, who was aware that Rance possesses Chaos.
